author: David A. Embury
description: A Natural Daiquiri with a refreshing, clean, citrusy, minty edge.
name: Fu Manchu Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
22.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
